Stay in a centrally located 3- or 4-star hotel, with daily breakfast and a private arrival transfer for a seamless start. Explore the city’s rich history on a half-day guided tour of Athens and the Acropolis Museum, then enjoy a full-day three island cruise to Hydra, Poros, and Aegina. Perfect for first-time visitors, this package offers a balance of comfort, culture, and leisure, giving travellers an unforgettable Greek experience in just a few days. Combine this package with a tour of mainland Greece, a Greek Island Cruise or Island Hopping Package. View more View less 3 nights + sightseeing & arrival transfer from $ 925 per person share twin. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until sold out Deal Includes 3 nights accommodation Breakfast daily Private arrival transfer from Athens Airport to the hotel Half day city tour of Athens including Acropolis Museum Full day three island cruise visiting Hydra, Poros and Aegina (with lunch onboard) Explore the major historical sites of Athens, including Parliament House, Temple of Olympian Zeus, Panathenaic Stadium, the Acropolis and the Acropolis Museum. Hotels are located in the heart of Athens, within walking distance to major attractions such as the Plaka area, Syntagma Square and the Acropolis. You can easily explore shops, tavernas and landmarks right from your doorstep. The full day cruise gives you the chance to experience three very different islands in just one trip – making it a relaxing yet enriching highlight without the need for extra time or ferry planning.
